title: Bring back the old lore!
body:
The new lore is barely lore at all. Old lore had depth and its own story with champions having connections with eachother, but now... its so BORING!

Please bring back the new lore and change the newer champions lore to be in-depth! 

New lore can be compared to the phrase "1st rule of Tautology club is the 1st rule of Tautology," because it basically boils down to "X champion is X Champion because he just is."

Its boring, and maybe, JUST MAYBE, if enough people support this idea then they will change the lore back.
